name: Heroes of Andromeda
description:
Heroes of Andromeda is the clicker you´ve been waiting for! Defeat countless monsters across the Andromeda galaxy, hire mercenaries to help you in battle, upgrade your damage in the shooting range, promote your helpers in the science lab, and improve power-ups at the engineering bay. In Heroes of Andromeda you don´t just buy your upgrades, you have to earn them by playing fun mini games. Enjoy the simple but beautilful pixelated landscapes of the Andromeda galaxy, with various planets and creatures to discover!

Features:
-Clicker addictive gameplay
-Various monsters and bosses
-3 side mini games to improve your skills
-Mercenaries to hire and help you defeat your enemies even when you´re not playing
-Tons of sci-fi eater eggs
-Online leaderboard
